definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The contradiction and identity of Japanese auxiliary words are the fundamental attributes of modern Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 日语助词间的对立和同一是现代日语的基本属性。

definition: form word/in Classical Chinese, the first character of phrase having auxiliary grammatical function
loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/character acquiring meanings by phonetic association/also called phonetic loan
falling tone/fourth tone in modern Mandarin
phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
two-syllable word featuring alliteration or rhyme, such as 玲瓏|玲珑[ling2 long2]
